title: The Final Scene of Uncharted 4: A Thief's End - PS I Love You XOXO Ep. 20
description:

How will Uncharted 4 end? Greg and Colin present their theories, and then proceed to talk about Mighty No. 9's delay and The Division's marketing. (Released 01.26.16)
